name: Dicego
description:
Roll dice around the infinitely many procedurally generated levels so that they have the same set value on top, then go to the stairs that will lead you into the next level. You have 60 seconds to finish one level. Levels get harder the deeper you go in.

Source available at https://github.com/ALEX11BR/dicego.

Controls:

Arrow keys: move the player

Enter: finish the current level and enter the next one, if you are standing over the stairs to the next level.
